articles.title: Mohanlal, Ajay Devgn to shoot for Drishyam 3 simulataneously in Malayalam, Hindi I Exclusive - India Today
articles.description: Mohanlal and Ajay Devgn were seen in the highly successful Drishyam franchise. Drishyam 3 is likely to be made and released in Malayalam and Hindi at the same time.
